text: Yendrick Alberto Ruiz González (San José, Costa Rica, 4 December 1987) is a Costa Rican football player who plays as a forward for C.S. Herediano. He is the younger brother of footballer Bryan Ruiz. He made his international debut for Costa Rica on May 28, 2013, in a friendly against Canada. == References == ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Costa Rican footballers Category:L.D.
